title: [Large-scale] Learning-Oriented Leadership Development in Hybrid Work Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental leadership theories and hybrid work environment experience
context.additional_context: Participants are current practitioners in language education, familiar with digital learning environments

learning_goals: Participants can design three leadership strategies to facilitate learning in hybrid environments
Participants can analyze practical cases and derive improvement plans by applying reflective learning techniques
Participants can establish a knowledge-sharing system through integrated discussion designs combining digital and physical spaces
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
